title: Draft Day 2 Hour Special
description:
Laura, Marcus, RC, Mina, Keyshawn, and Dan discuss who’ll be the 1st overall pick, thoughts on Kenny Pickett and Malik Willis, “Sauce” Gardner vs Stingley Jr., Ohio State’s top tier wide receivers, top stories for the draft, and Travis Kelce joins the show. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: 2 Hour Draft Day Special and Travis Kelce Joins the Show.
